ComicInfo.Summary:
The Spirit Hunters team investigates a mysterious death at a traveling carnival that is surrounded by the rumors of a vengeful spirit. But the first victim is soon followed by another...and another and it's not long before the team realizes that they are trapped in a fun-house of horror from which there may be no escape.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Harvey Tolibao & Ivan Nunes | 1 | B | Cover B | Richard Ortiz & Ylenia Di Napoli | 2 | C | Cover C | Noah Salonga & Ceci de la Cruz | 3 | D | Cover D | Gregbo Watson & Jorge Cortes | 4 | E | ZENBOX Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 300 | Dawn McTeigue | Missing |
